wikitext.*:
{{title|italics}} {{book |title=''The Trees, the Jewels and the Rings:
A Discursive Enquiry Into Things Little Known on Middle-earth'' | image = The trees, the jewels and the rings.jpg | author=[[Charles E. Noad]] | publisher=[[The Tolkien Society]] | date=[[1977]] |format=Softcover |pages=44 | isbn=0905520017 }} '''''The Trees, the Jewels and the Rings: A Discursive Enquiry Into Things Little Known on Middle-earth''''' is a work of speculation by [[Charles E. Noad]] about the possible content of ''The Silmarillion''. It was published in January [[1977]],[https://www.amazon.ae/Trees-Jewels-Rings-Discursive-Middle-earth/dp/0905520017 The Trees, the Jewels and the Rings] on Amazon.com (accessed 7 July 2023) just a few months before the published version of ''[[The Silmarillion]]''. ==External links== * [https://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?post_id=50078#forumpost50078 Pictures and description of the book] in Charles Noad's obituary on [[Tolkien Collector's Guide]] ==See also== *''[[An Extrapolation on The Silmarillion]]'' *''[[Tolkien and The Silmarillion]]'' {{references}} [[Category:Publications by title]] [[Category:Publications by the Tolkien Society]] [[Category:Scholarly books]]
